venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description:
Session One | 6-9:30pm; beer stops @ 9:30pm

The original fest that helped define what "Extreme Beer" is all about. Expect a uniquely awesome and epic celebration of American brewers who push the boundaries of creative brewing. Quite possibly the best fest on planet Earth w/ 100+ Extreme Beers. Limited to 1,000 tickets per session.

Secure your attendance. Order your advance tickets now.

Includes:

* Entrance into one of best fests on Planet Earth.
* All 2oz pours; Respect Beer.
* Tasting cup.
* Fest guide.
* Beer education.

An additional shipping / handling fee will be added to all ticket orders.

Held at The Cyclorama at the Boston Center for the Arts - 539 Tremont Street in Boston, MA




Get your tickets here:
http://beeradvocate.c...
item.name: Extreme Beer Fest: Session 2
